ai.summary: A gentle 2.3 km loop near Carn Brea offering an easy walk on well-maintained paths. With minimal elevation gain, this short hike is suitable for beginners, families, and casual walkers seeking a quick outdoor outing in the UK.
ai.terrain_summary: The route typically follows a mix of compact paths and short sections of uneven ground. Expect gentle slopes and some rocky or grassy patches; footwear with good grip is recommended. The terrain is generally easy underfoot with occasional uneven stones.
ai.safety_notes: Check the weather before you go and be prepared for sudden changes. Wear sturdy footwear and stay on marked paths. Bring water, a light layer, and a small first aid kit. Keep an eye on children and pets near any exposed or uneven sections. Let someone know your plans if you’re hiking solo.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking shoes or light hiking boots
Weather-appropriate layers (waterproof if rain is likely)
Map or GPS device, or a charged phone with offline maps
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (drier months preferred; can be enjoyed year-round with appropriate clothing)

seo.title: Carn Brea BR 19 — Easy 2.3 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover an easy 2.3 km hike at Carn Brea BR 19 in the UK. Short distance, gentle terrain, and beginner-friendly scenery for a quick outdoor escape.
